At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Thorn makes two hand crossbow attacks.

Recharge 6

Minor

+12 vs Reflex; target is restrained (save ends).

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Weapon

Minor

+12 vs Reflex; target is blinded (save ends).

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When hit by a ranged or area attack, at-will

Thorn makes a hand crossbow attack against the target that hit him.

Encounter ✦ Weapon

Standard

Area burst 2 within 10; +12 vs AC; 3d6+8 damage.

Encounter ✦ Weapon

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Thorn's bolt storm recharges, and he uses it immediately.

Encounter

Free

Thorn can reroll an attack roll. He must use the second roll, even if it is lower.
Thron ignores difficult terrain when he shifts.
